channel.title: Confidence interval calculators :: Peter ten Klooster
channel.description: Here you can find some calculators for computing approximate confidence intervals for observed Pearson correlations or r-square values from multiple regressions, or for differences between two independent correlations or r-squares, given the respective sample size(s).

item.title: Confidence Intervals for Pearson Correlation
item.description: Observed Pearson correlation (r): Sample size (n): Confidence interval (CI): 80% 85% 90% 95% 99% Approximate confidence interval: to Approximate confidence intervals for an observed Pearson r correlation, given the value of r and the sample size n. For example: for an observed correlation of 0.657 and a sample size of 15, the 95% confidence interval ranges from 0.22 to 0.87.
